amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act to the Department of Justice may be used to prevent a State from implementing its own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of industrial hemp, as defined in section 7606 of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (Public Law 113-79).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to prevent a State from implementing its own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of industrial hemp.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 146 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 146 (Roll no. 280).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
